label: 王朝国家
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: “court-centered polity,” a historiographical expression used by modern historians to differentiate the government presided over by the tenth-century court from that of the ritsuryô “tennô-centered” government of Nara and early Heian times.　[律令] [天皇]
